data.text: @GerdVL @GerdVL Unfortunately we can't say at the moment. ^Audrey
@LeShuttle Any idea when we can expect this? By Eastern or summer holidays? 😊

@SandraSerwaa96 @GerdVL @SandraSerwaa96  Hi Sandra, there is no current plan to reintroduce the Frequent Traveller scheme and we appreciate that this is disappointing. We review ticket types and we'll be in contact with our regular customers about any discounted tickets we introduce in the future^Audrey

@GerdVL @GerdVL Hi there, there are no current plans to reintroduce the Frequent Traveller scheme and we appreciate that this is disappointing. We review ticket types and we will be in contact with our regular customers about any discounted tickets we introduce in the future. ^Audrey
@GerdVL @LeShuttle Same here...when are they coming back because the standard ticket prices are INSANE..to say the least. I travel alone most of the time so is really expensive.
@LeShuttle You guys are doing a great job, but I'm still missing the Frequent Traveller tickets. 🙄
@LeShuttle How are the toilets calais side??? Clean???
